backend/main.mo: Actor canister managing user profiles, admin-only slot/pricing settings, and block/unblock logic with owner-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing all frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and global providers including theme and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar showing daily slots with booking and blocking status and refresh support.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Dialog allowing admins to block or unblock a slot with optional reason input.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings based on a selected date, fetching revenue and booking counts via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/EmergencyO: Provides a form to submit an emergency reset code and trigger ownership reset through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Loads pricing rule settings, allows editing rate values and floodlight hours, and saves updates via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Fetches and edits turf slot configuration including opening/closing times and slot duration with validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Shows a restriction message for non-owners and provides navigation back to the booking page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity, showing appropriate button states and clearing queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by verifying authentication and admin status, prompting profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Displays available booking slots with formatted time and price, allowing users to select a slot.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Handles booking details entry, authentication checks, and submission to create a booking.
Shows a summary of the selected date, time, sport, and total price for a booking.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header navigation, authentication-aware routing, and page content container.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for Internet Identity authentication, login state management, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, ownership actions, and other operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light and dark CSS variables with a neon-accent dark theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders an admin dashboard with tabs for calendar, settings, and earnings management.
Handles admin authentication, ownership claiming, and redirect logic using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays booking confirmation details or errors based on booking lookup.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Allows customers to select a date, view available slots, calculate prices, and make bookings.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Shows a placeholder payment page describing upcoming integration and routes to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Provides a form for users to enter a booking ID and navigate to its confirmation page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL and hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from storage or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for styling the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and pending feature requests related to implementing an ownership reset code of 73024141.
